body_html: @jekbradbury I think ENV PATH /opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py$PYTHON_VERSION/bin:/opt/conda/bin/:$PATH is wrong. Exposing the bin folder of the root env will lead to weird side-effects such as binaries in root env being exposed in pytorch env.

body: @jekbradbury I think `ENV PATH /opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py$PYTHON_VERSION/bin:/opt/conda/bin/:$PATH` is wrong. Exposing the `bin` folder of the root env will lead to weird side-effects such as binaries in root env being exposed in pytorch env.
